src:
Hasil FP4 MotoGP Malaysia: Morbidelli Terdepan, Bekuk Catatan Rossi
02 Nov 2019, 14:07 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT, Franco Morbidelli, kembali sukses mencatat waktu tercepat dalam sesi latihan bebas keempat (FP4) MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pebalap Italia berdarah Brasil ini diikuti oleh pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Ducati Team, Andrea Dovizioso, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT lainnya, Fabio Quartararo, dan pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez.
Berikut hasil FP4 MotoGP Malaysia 2019.
text:
Malaysian MotoGP FP4 Results: Leading Morbidelli, Beat Rossi's Record
02 Nov 2019, 14:07 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha SRT Petronas rider, Franco Morbidelli, again successfully recorded the fastest time in the fourth free practice session (FP4) Malaysian MotoGP at the Sepang Circuit on Saturday (2/11/2019).
The Italian-blooded Brazilian rider was followed by Yamaha Energy Monster racer Valentino Rossi in second place and Ducati Team rider Andrea Dovizioso in third position.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by another Yamaha SRT Petronas rider, Fabio Quartararo, and Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez.
Following are the results of the 2019 MotoGP Malaysia Malaysian FP4.
